name: A Timely Rescue
description:
A short platformer made for the VimJam Game Jam. Textures and Font from Kenney.nl, Background Tracks from Michorvath on Freesound.

The Evil Jester has stolen all the villagers' souls! You have to hurry to the Castle  before he returns in 5 minutes and use the Soul Machine to get back all the villagers' souls. Pick up as many of the villager's lost souls as you can on the way. Then, don't forget to return them to the village.

Keyboard Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement/Menu Selection

Spacebar - Jump

E - Interact in Game

F - Interact with Menu Buttons

Escape - Pause

Controller Controls:

D-Pad/Left Stick - Movement/Menu Selection

A Button - Jump/Interact in Menu

X Button - Interact in Game

Menu Button - Pause
